replies.body: I'm in silver, won't be seeing anyone with this icon anytime soon.
At least silver isn't as toxic as mercury or lead tier. I just got lead V and dear lord it's like I'm chasing down singed.
Don't forget Cardboard 8 and Wood 7.
those arent toxic elements though... it was a chemistry joke

I just got past Arsenic III :(

{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
I never thought I'd do this but I literally logged in just to upvote.
I'm silver 5 and I got it...
It's a joke, because silver is a pretty toxic elo. I'm in silver {{item:3070}}
I'm plat and got it. But that's because I'm a lot better than all of you and I'm nice about it. scrubs /s
I've been silver the entire year until a week ago. Being in a lower elo is no excuse for being toxic.
But it's also the reason a lot of people are there.
I dont want to check my account to see if I got it...
You got it.  Grats. :P
Wow you're nice.
Hey, I try!  I got the icon too. :D

Pretty sure its like mandatory to get the icon for a Rioter. :I
Like... zero bans... ever... else you'll probably be fired or something...
Actually, I know a few Rioters who didn't get it.  Of course the reason for that is they like to test bans on their live accounts, but still I know a few!
o.O weird
Give me your riot icon pls
Nioceeeee. Buh why can't graves have a cigar?

[This is the reason.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/QU1FzRg5-graves-cigar-got-removed?sort_type=best&comment=000f)

Honestly though, I think it's because cigar smell sticks in your hair FOREVER and we just didn't want that anymore.

Hi Riot Hollymonster :D,
I haven't gotten any restrictions and I didn't get the icon T-T ;-;. Could you please let me know if I somehow did get banned and I don't remember it or if there was just a mistake, it would make me feel better :)
I'm guessing Dunkey didn't get this then. RIP DUNKEY.

Nice! Waiting for mine now.

edit: not a joke. Never had a single behavior issue in league!
Same, maybe it'll take a day or two to roll out.
Nope, they're all out for NA already.  If you think you should have got one and didn't just make sure you scroll down a bit because it isn't at the top of your icon inventory.

Does that have anything to do because the start date of this is from 6/15? So it counts the icon as being released back in 6/15 or something?

Edit: Just curious :^0!

It has more to do with how things are added into the backend inventory.  This specific item was added a pretty long time ago, so it's farther back on the 'list'.  

The way the icons show up for players is in the order we added them into that inventory.
Thanks Holly! I thought I didn't get it and I was so heartbroken and disapointed in myself, and then I scrolled down and it was right there! :D
You already got yours.  You likely can't see it because it isn't the first in your inventory.  Scroll down a bit and you should find it!
Is there a notification when you log in?

No notification this time.   

We're working with the PBJ team to make sure this happens for future initiatives, but there wasn't enough time to make it happen for this one. :(

Hey Hollymonster, thanks for taking the time to comment here.  I appreciate that a Riot employee is taking the time to talk to individual people.  As a company, you've been doing a better and better job of communicating lately.
I don't need a reply, just put up your hand to recieve the air high-five I just sent your way
http://0.media.collegehumor.cvcdn.com/82/38/32771b4d97dd7d087187ec99e4f443e1-tina-fey-self-five.gif
Hi hollymonster, can you please check my account to see if there was a mistake or if I got punished without knowing during this time, I dont see my icon D: Thanks and sorry for bothering ;-;

Just checked, you weren't eligible - sorry dude. :(

If you're not sure why, feel free to write in a ticket.
I sent in a ticket asking when my last punishment was a few weeks back, but i got a response saying that the information couldn't be disclosed, that's why im not sure :/ but thanks

Sorry guys,

I can't check anymore tonight.  Gotta go pick up my pups from daycare and make dinner.

If you're not sure if you're eligible just make sure to check out your entire icon inventory.  The icon won't show up at the top and there is no notification that you got it this time.

If you're concerned because you think you should have gotten it but didn't - you can [write in a ticket here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
We can get positive play icons but Graves can't have a cigar
I will always love this.

@Hollymonster: Is there any way at all that actual context for various icons on our inventories can be provided in the client? Like, when we select one, replace the text explaining what a summoner icon is, with a description of what the selected icon was actually for?

I've played since beta and have amassed a pretty good stock of icons at this point. Some are self explanatory, but others, I just have a hard time remembering where they came from.

Yeah, I've played since Jan 2010 and have a HUGE icon inventory as well.

I'd love for this to happen, but I have no idea if or when it will.  I really want it too!
bonus points if it shows what percentage of the community also owns a copy.  (you get to see how special you are!)  :3
I logged on hoping to get one but didnt. ;-;
You did get it.  Check your whole icon inventory!
I got a leaver buster 5-min queue restriction a month or so ago. Is this going to stop me from getting this schway new icon?
Nope.  You already have it actually.
Indeed I did! It was hiding between the Nemisis Draft and Poro King event icons. Dang poro's trying to hide away my stuff~! Thanks Hollymonster
Poros are cute, but devious little fluffballs!
